## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3e04651c22680b6be9b2c9bebda456acd5e926821c0f4e7bce8770479da27691)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'openbet-access-controller' @ 4.4.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
